p: The study objectives were addressed in a descriptive cross-sectional online survey. This study was conducted in Jordan during the Coronavirus outbreak (from 15 to 30 March 2020). Eligible participants were licensed pharmacists practicing in community and hospital pharmacies in Jordan, academics and pharmacy students. Ethics approval for the study was obtained from the Faculty of Pharmacy, Applied Science Private University. Participation in the study did not pose any risk to participants and was voluntary. Potential participants who completed the survey were considered to have given informed consent for participation in the study.
